sentences.en: Apple is ruthlessly astute in protecting its business model.
sentences.cn: 苹果无情并精明得保护自己的商业模式.

sentences.en: Do not rule over them ruthlessly, but fear your God.
sentences.cn: 不可严严地辖管他.只要敬畏你的神.

sentences.en: Far too many beautiful buildings in London are being ruthlessly demolished.
sentences.cn: 在伦敦,正在被无情拆除的美丽建筑太多了.

sentences.en: I also did things like put myself on auto-response and I ruthlessly stopped caring about a lot of things (to make psychic space for my primary aim of liberation). That's about the gist of it.
sentences.cn: 我也会做一些像把博客调成自动回复，残忍地忽视很多事（让我最初的解放目标有个心灵上的空当）。这是要点。

sentences.en: It was like a Liema, ruthlessly trampling on my confidence.
sentences.cn: 它又像一匹烈马, 无情地践踏我的信心.

sentences.en: Rising interest rates ruthlessly reduced the value all existing fixed - coupon investments.
sentences.cn: 升高的利息无情的减少了现存的固定收益投资的价值.

sentences.en: Ruthlessly summarised , the book's storyline goes like this.
sentences.cn: 大致说来, 情节是这样的.

sentences.en: The animals were ruthlessly hunted to the verge of extinction.
sentences.cn: 这些动物由于遭到无情的捕猎而濒于灭绝.

sentences.en: The brutal soldiers beat their prisoners ruthlessly.
sentences.cn: 残暴的士兵野蛮地抽打俘虏.

sentences.en: The peasants were kept down ruthlessly by the occupying power.
sentences.cn: 占领国残酷地压迫农民.

sentences.en: The people who were held ruthlessly would not yield to aggressors.
sentences.cn: 受到侵略者残酷镇压的人民是决不会向他们屈服的.

sentences.en: The president ruthlessly disposed of his rivals, eg dismissed them, had them killed.
sentences.cn: 这位总统无情地除掉了政敌(如将他们撤职或杀害).

sentences.en: They still do, of course, but when they do they're ruthlessly pruned.
sentences.cn: 当然大人也可以逃避, 但是他们会遭到无情的修理.

sentences.en: They'd ruthlessly choked off all opposition to their plans.
sentences.cn: 他们无情地把反对他们的方案都压制下去了.

sentences.en: Works of art and priceless historical records were ruthlessly destroyed.
sentences.cn: 艺术品和珍贵史料全被无情地毁掉了.

sentences.en: Works of art, historic monuments and priceless historical records were ruthlessly destroyed.
sentences.cn: 艺术作品 、 历史遗址以及无法估价的史料均遭到残酷的破坏.
